messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: SEATTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Cybersecurity Unit
SIGNAL: 93C
ITEM NUMBER: C-93080-30
PAGE 35 of 75
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Emily Anderson
Sgt. Michael Johnson
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Robert Martinez
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Jessica Davis
Sgt. Daniel Rodriguez
( Cyber Operations Unit)
Det. Sarah King
Det. Brian Lee
( Cyber Operations Unit)
Det. Linda Harris
( Cyber Operations Unit)
Det. Steven Thompson
Det. Karen Wilson
(General Assignment)
Det. Richard Adams
(Identity Theft Unit)
Det. Anna Garcia
(Data Analysis Unit)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, software engineer.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
05 MAY 2030 at around 11:00 PM in the Capitol Hill area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Robert Martinez
5129
The investigation unraveled through layers of encrypted data and anonymous cyber threats. Officer Williams, monitoring the Capitol Hill area, was the first to detect unusual network anomalies. He was swiftly assisted by Sgt. Jessica Davis and Patrol Officer Wilson, who initiated cybersecurity protocols. Technician Evans, proficient in cyber analysis, was tasked with tracing the data breaches. Criminalist Parker, diving deep into the cyber evidence, identified patterns suggesting a targeted attack. Coroner Dr. Lewis was called to examine an individual found in a related cyber extortion case, which provided unexpected leads to the cybercrime. Patrol Officer Thompson, working in tandem with tech companies, gathered crucial information that played a key role in cracking the case.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Emily Anderson Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Cybersecurity Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Michael Johnson Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Anderson. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Robert Martinez Officer Context: Lead investigator for the cybersecurity case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Jessica Davis Officer Context: Assisted in initiating cybersecurity protocols, part of the Cyber Operations Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Daniel Rodriguez Officer Context: Cyber Operations Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Sarah King Officer Context: Cyber Operations Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Brian Lee Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Cyber Operations Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Linda Harris Officer Context: Cyber Operations Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Steven Thompson Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Karen Wilson Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the cybersecurity case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Richard Adams Officer Context: Identity Theft Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Anna Garcia Officer Context: Data Analysis Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Williams Officer Context: First to detect network anomalies in Capitol Hill area. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Wilson Officer Context: Assisted in initiating cybersecurity protocols. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Evans Officer Context: Specialized in cyber analysis, traced data breaches. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Parker Officer Context: Analyzed cyber evidence, identified patterns of a targeted attack. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Lewis Officer Context: Examined a victim in a cyber extortion case, provided leads to the cybercrime. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Thompson Officer Context: Collaborated with tech companies, gathered information crucial to the case. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
